text:
UpMetrics | Senior Backend Engineer | San Francisco | Full Time, On Site

UpMetrics empowers youth and community organizations through data, offering actionable insights that make programs sustainable. In addition to resources for communication and roster management, afterschool and cocurricular teams and groups were in need of program data and engagement metrics to help show their value in an increasingly data-driven grant-funding marketplace.

We provide the best tools and services for activity programs to analyze, interpret and use their data to expand their services, make better decisions and increase funding opportunities.

If youâ€™re passionate about building great products and have an interest in joining an exciting, funded start-up in the world of education, data and metrics, we want to hear from you!

You can find more info at https://medium.com/upmetrics-data-for-good/back-end-engineer..., and can apply by emailing us at careers@upmetrics.com
